mapper.select: SELECT horse_no, horse_name,kind,age,weight,gender,speed , decode(total_games,0,0,((win_count / (total_games)) * 100)) as win_rate FROM HORSE ORDER BY HORSE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO horse (horse_no, horse_name, kind, age, weight, gender, speed) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(horse_no)+1,1) as horse_no FROM horse), #{horse_name}, #{kind}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{speed} )
mapper.update: UPDATE horse SET horse_name = #{horse_name}, kind = #{kind}, age = #{age}, weight = #{weight}, gender = #{gender}, speed = #{speed} WHERE horse_no = #{horse_no}
